br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.rpg

Class RpgPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.rpg.RpgPlatform

  • public class RpgPlatform
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main core of the RPG exploring mechanic. It handles the interaction between the RPG Elements.
